JOB DESCRIPTION:
(UG - Any Graduate - Any Specialization) AND (PG - Post Graduation Not Required) AND ( Doctorate - Any Doctorate - Any Specialization,  Doctorate Not Required) 1 to 2 yrs Job Description : - Very strong knowledge backed by adequate WORK EXPOSURE on Basics of ABAP/ Core ABAP is a must.
